---
title: "About This Website"
---

This is an [R Markdown website](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/rmarkdown_websites.html) for the course Hitchhikers Guide to Reproducible Research taught at the [Emory University Summer Institute in Statistics and Modeling in Infectious Diseases (SISMID)](https://sph.emory.edu/SISMID/index.html).

The 2.5 day course is taught by by [David Benkeser](https://davidbphd.com/) and [Julia Wrobel](http://juliawrobel.com/).

Source code for the website can be found [on GitHub](https://github.com/julia-wrobel/reproducible_research).
